subtitle.es: De los Fundamentos a la Experiencia

introduction.en: My story began nearly a decade ago when I realized I wanted to be an engineer to become a teacher. Eventually, I decided to change course and dove into the world of telecommunications engineering and web development. Every one of us was once that restless soul that took everything apart just to understand how it worked. Here's how my journey through education shaped me into the developer I am today.

content.en: To fullfill my destiny, I chose to start by the roots. I gained foundational knowledge in computer science fundamentals that became the bedrock of my career. content.en: Driven by curiosity, I started on a self-taught journey into web development, where it became the focus of my final year project. I started with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, gradually progressing to more advanced topics like responsive design, front-end frameworks with VUE.JS, and back-end API development with Python. Speaking of my final year project, I developed a full-fledged web platform dedicated to conducting quiz-style tests for learning new skills, applying everything I had learned and facing real-world development challenges. This hands-on experience was invaluable in solidifying my understanding of web technologies and development workflows, earning an outstanding grade from the evaluation committee.

Si pasamos a hablar del TFG, desarroll√© una plataforma web completa dedicada a realizar cuestionarios tipo test para aprender una nueva habilidad, aplicando todo lo aprendido y enfrent√°ndome a desaf√≠os reales de desarrollo. Esta experiencia pr√°ctica fue invaluable para consolidar mi comprensi√≥n de las tecnolog√≠as web y los flujos de trabajo de desarrollo, obteniendo una calificaci√≥n de sobresaliente por parte del tribunal evaluador.

title.en: The world wide company, Harmonic inc hired me to work as a DevOps Engineer

content.en: In March 2023, I embarked on a professional journey with Harmonic Inc as a DevOps Engineer. I've been involved in setting up CI/CD pipelines, managing cloud infrastructure, and ensuring seamless collaboration between development and operations teams. This experience has been instrumental in honing my skills in DevOps practices and tools, preparing me for future challenges in the tech industry.

Entre las habilidades que destacar√≠a, se encuentran gestionar la comunicaci√≥n con clientes internacionales y participar en turnos de On Call para las regiones EMEA, AMS y APAC, as√≠ como evaluar el estado de los contenedores mediante comandos de Kubernetes para asegurar un rendimiento √≥ptimo del sistema.
